page.title: 20687 Commercial Road E14 7LF
page.content: This is an early Georgian house built around 160 years ago.It is in a fair condition for its age but needs quite alot of general repairs to be carried out.It is the middle house of a terrace of 5 on the A13.The volume of traffic passing to,from and through the City is considerable but is not a distraction. In 1984 the house was sold for 31,000 pounds after being left empty for some years.There is a fair sized garden to the rear of the house which is also being worked on.It is a 4 storey house with 2 rooms on each floor.The basement has a kitchen and living room.The bath room is on the ground floor at the back while the front room has become a study The rest of the rooms are all bedrooms. The house contains many of the original features and it is hoped will be fully restored to its former glory. Frank MacDonald
